name: Athlete Shave Salon Kid Games (Girls & Boys)
name_original: Athlete Shave Salon Kid Games (Girls & Boys)
description:
Can you help your friends get ready for the big Game?

Play the best Sports Shave Salon game in the app store today!! 8+ fun spa beauty games wrapped up into a single game!!

Sooo many Levels & Game Modes:
* Ready for a Mohawk? Get crazy at the salon!
- It's time to shave that head! Go to the Shave Salon!
- Time for a hair makeover. Look cool for the game!
- Much more salon makeover fun!

Enjoy!
